effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 117,913 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Falling below 60% health surrounds you with a protective vortex of junk, reducing damage taken by 50% for 15 sec or until 1.3 million damage is prevented. This effect may only occur every 30 sec.

After 20 sec without activating while in combat, the Scrapfield overloads to energize you with 3,064 Haste for 12 sec.

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 363 Strength up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 59,078 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 134,276.

Equip: Taking magic damage has a chance for the webbing to react and adapt, spinning Warding Threads around you for 30 sec. While active, Warding Threads absorb all damage you would take from that source's spell school, up to 4.5 million. (2 min Cooldown)
